definition: talking and laughing/to jest/cheerful and lively
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: They were having a laugh and watching the Stoke v Blackburn game.
sentences.chinese: 他们有说有笑，一边看着斯托克城和布莱克本的比赛。

sentences.english: Everyone talking and laughing, imperceptible already to jade screen peak.
sentences.chinese: 大家有说有笑，不知不觉已到了玉屏峰。

sentences.english: Then they rode on, talking and laughing as before.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他们骑着马继续前行，跟原来那样有说有笑。

sentences.english: They're talking and laughing, but the festive mood is about to come to an end.
sentences.chinese: 他们有说有笑，但是，节日气氛即将结束。

sentences.english: She was remarkably silent when the others all talked and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 别人有说有笑时她却沉默不语，显得很突出。

sentences.english: We chatted for about ten minutes, laughing and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我们有说有笑地聊了大约十分钟。

sentences.english: Mountaineering holidays, meal Walking, I with the students in small, Weishuiweixiao.
sentences.chinese: 假日爬山，饭后散步，我与学生三五成群，有说有笑。

sentences.english: A group of children came out of the classroom, laughing and talking.
sentences.chinese: 一群孩子有说有笑地从教室里走出来。

sentences.english: The students came into the classroom laughing and talking.
sentences.chinese: 学生们有说有笑地走进教室。

sentences.english: Often of a morning Babbitt came bouncing and jesting in to breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 巴比特往常总是兴冲冲地，有说有笑地下楼吃早饭。

sentences.english: In the morning we bicycled to the suburbs to plant trees talking and laughing all the way.
sentences.chinese: 在早上，我们骑自行车到郊区植树，一路上有说有笑。

sentences.english: I looked back, they are laughing and talking to zongzi.
sentences.chinese: 我回头一看，他们正在有说有笑地包粽子。

definition: to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
to act as though there were nobody else present/unselfconscious/fig. without regard for others
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
